TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public MustInherit Class CollectionBase Implements IList
public ref class CollectionBase abstract : System::Collections::IList

summary.span: 提供强类型集合的 基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for a strongly typed collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A实例始终是可修改。A instance is always modifiable. 请参阅为此类的一个只读版本。See for a read-only version of this class. 容量是元素的数目可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 可以通过设置减少容量属性显式。The capacity can be decreased by setting the property explicitly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现创建的集合对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不提供同步 （线程安全） 包装器，但是，派生的类可以创建他们自己的同步的版本使用属性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

para.span: 此基类用于轻松实现器来创建强类型的自定义集合。

span.span: This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a strongly typed custom collection.

para.span: 建议来扩展此基类的类，而不是创建其自己的实施者。

span.span: Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected CollectionBase ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: CollectionBase();

summary.span: 使用默认初始容量初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default initial capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: protected CollectionBase (int capacity);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 capacity) cil managed
Protected Sub New (capacity As Integer)
protected: CollectionBase(int capacity);

param.name: capacity
param.span: 新列表最初可以存储的元素数。

span.span: The number of elements that the new list can initially store.

summary.span: 使用指定的容量初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`capacity`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Capacity { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 可包含的元素数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of elements that the can contain.
The number of elements that the can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的元素数的可以存储。 is the number of elements that the can store. 是中的实际的元素数目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 大于或等于始终是。 is always greater than or equal to . 如果超过时添加元素，则自动通过增大容量在复制旧元素和添加新的元素之前重新分配在内部数组。If exceeds while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 可以通过设置减少容量属性显式。The capacity can be decreased by setting the property explicitly. 时的值设置了显式，在内部数组还重新分配以适应指定的容量。When the value of is set explicitly, the internal array is also reallocated to accommodate the specified capacity. 检索此属性的值的运算 o （1）;将属性设置为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`新容量。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the new capacity.

exception.span: 已设置为一个小于 的值。

span.span: is set to a value that is less than .

exception.span: 系统上没有足够的可用内存。

span.span: There is not enough memory available on the system.

summary.span: 从 实例移除所有对象。

span.span: Removes all objects from the instance.

summary.span: 不能重写此方法。

span.span: This method cannot be overridden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为零。 is set to zero. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 若要执行自定义操作之前或之后清除的集合，重写受保护或方法。To perform custom actions before or after the collection is cleared, override the protected or method.

summary.span: 返回循环访问 实例的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the instance.
An for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置，调用引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，则调用引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果之间修改集合和，返回到，设置的元素，即使枚举数已经无效。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 该枚举数不具有独占访问集合的权限；因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 虽然方法不是对默认情况下，COM 客户端可见继承类可以公开它，并且可以在 COM 客户端导致意外行为。While the method is not visible to COM clients by default, inheriting the class can expose it and can cause undesirable behavior in COM clients. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现创建的集合对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnClear() cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnClear ()
protected: virtual void OnClear();

summary.span: 当清除 实例的内容时执行其他自定义进程。

span.span: Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现需要通过执行一些操作之前清除集合的派生类中重写。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action before the collection is cleared. 仅在返回的实例上调用 On \* 方法属性，但不是能在返回的实例属性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果进程失败，集合将恢复到以前的状态。If the process fails, the collection reverts back to its previous state. 此方法的默认实现是一个 o （1） 操作。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation.

para.span: 此方法允许实施者能定义从基础中删除所有元素之前必须执行的过程。

span.span: This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed before deleting all the elements from the underlying .

para.span: 通过定义此方法，实施者可以对继承的方法添加功能，而无需重写所有其他方法。

span.span: By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods.

para.span: 而在标准的清除行为之前调用标准清除行为之后调用。

span.span: is invoked before the standard Clear behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Clear behavior.

para.span: 例如，实施者可以免除中删除全局清除的某些元素。

span.span: For example, implementers can exempt certain elements from deletion by a global Clear.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现需要通过执行一些操作之后清除集合的派生类中重写。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action after the collection is cleared. 仅在返回的实例上调用 On \* 方法属性，但不是能在返回的实例属性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 此方法的默认实现是一个 o （1） 操作。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation.

span.span: By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods.

para.span: 而在标准的清除行为之前调用标准清除行为之后调用。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现需要通过之后插入指定的元素执行某些操作在派生类中重写。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action after the specified element is inserted. 仅在返回的实例上调用 On \* 方法属性，但不是能在返回的实例属性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果发生以下其中一项，则集合将恢复到以前的状态：The collection reverts back to its previous state if one of the following occurs: - 过程将失败。The process fails. - 重写此方法以引发异常。This method is overridden to throw an exception. 此方法的默认实现是一个 o （1） 操作。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 当从 实例移除元素时执行其他自定义进程。

span.span: Performs additional custom processes when removing an element from the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现需要由派生类中移除指定的元素之前执行一些操作中重写。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action before the specified element is removed. 仅在返回的实例上调用 On \* 方法属性，但不是能在返回的实例属性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果进程失败，集合将恢复到以前的状态。If the process fails, the collection reverts back to its previous state. 此方法的默认实现是一个 o （1） 操作。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现创建的集合对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

para.span: 此方法允许实施者能定义从基础删除元素之前必须执行的过程。

span.span: This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed before removing the element from the underlying .

para.span: 通过定义此方法，实施者可以对继承的方法添加功能，而无需重写所有其他方法。

span.span: By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods.

para.span: 而在标准的移除行为之前, 调用标准删除行为之后调用。

span.span: is invoked before the standard Remove behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Remove behavior.

para.span: 例如，实施者可以阻止移除元素，通过始终引发异常。

span.span: For example, implementers can prevent removal of elements by always throwing an exception in .

para.span: 此方法之前调用。

span.span: is called prior to this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现需要通过执行一些操作删除指定的元素之后的派生类中重写。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action after the specified element is removed. 仅在返回的实例上调用 On \* 方法属性，但不是能在返回的实例属性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果发生以下其中一项，则集合将恢复到以前的状态：The collection reverts back to its previous state if one of the following occurs: - 过程将失败。The process fails. - 重写此方法以引发异常。This method is overridden to throw an exception. 此方法的默认实现是一个 o （1） 操作。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation.

para.span: 而在标准的移除行为之前, 调用标准删除行为之后调用。

span.span: is invoked before the standard Remove behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Remove behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: is less than zero.
-or-
is equal to or greater than .

span.span: This method calls , , and .

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized
ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized
property bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A实例不同步。A instance is not synchronized. 派生的类可以提供的同步的版本使用属性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: object System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot { get; }
.property instance object System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot
ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot
property System::Object ^ System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类可以提供自己的同步的版本使用属性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作的，而不是直接在。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对修改其他线程对象。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等于容量、 通过自动重新分配在内部数组并将现有的元素复制到新数组，然后才能添加新元素列表的容量加倍。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array and copying the existing elements to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小于容量，此方法为 o （1） 运算。If is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果容量需要增加以容纳新元素，此方法会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现创建的集合对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 此方法通过调用可确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling . 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象和方法`item`以确定是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定和方法`item`参数的集合中的对象。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现创建的集合对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 此方法通过调用可确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling . 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象和方法`item`以确定是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定和方法`item`参数的集合中的对象。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现创建的集合对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

virtual void System.Collections.IList.Insert(int index, System::Object ^ value) = System::Collections::IList::Insert;

param.name: index
param.span: 从零开始的索引，应在该位置插入 value。

param.name: value
param.span: 要插入的 。

span.span: The to insert.

summary.span: 将元素插入 的指定索引处。

span.span: Inserts an element into the at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已经等于容量、 列表的容量翻倍通过自动重新分配在内部数组，才能插入新元素。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`等同于，`value`添加到末尾。If `index` is equal to , `value` is added to the end of . 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，插入点下面的元素将下移以容纳新的元素。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现创建的集合对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize
ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean Implements IList.IsFixedSize
property bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否具有固定大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 具有固定大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是只是一个集合的包装器防止添加和移除元素;因此，如果对基础集合，包括添加或移除元素，进行更改的固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly
ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean Implements IList.IsReadOnly
property bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

value.span: 如果 是只读的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的是只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含指定的对象，保持不变。If the does not contain the specified object, the remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 此方法通过调用可确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling . 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现创建的集合对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects.
